member.name: M:AECOM.GNGApi.Controllers.GoNoGoController.PutGoNoGo(System.String,AECOM.GNGApi.Models.GoNoGo)
member.summary: Prupose: UPDATE "Existing" GNG record for opportunityId HttpVerb:PUT Input: (MUST) OpportunityId in URI and actual GNG Record as a Body of request GNG Record MUST to have Id Content-Type:Application/json Output: Http Resonse Status example: https://myserverurl/api/v1/byopId/OPPO-004

member.name: M:AECOM.GNGApi.Controllers.GoNoGoController.PutByIdGoNoGo(System.Int32,AECOM.GNGApi.Models.GoNoGo)
member.summary: Prupose: UPDATE "Existing" GNG record for Id HttpVerb:PUT Input: (MUST) Id in URI and actual GNG Record as a Body of request GNG Record MUST to have Id Content-Type:Application/json Output: Http Response Status example: https://myserverurl/api/v1/bygngId/8

members.member:
Prupose: UPDATE "Existing" GNG record for opportunityId HttpVerb:POST Input: GNG Record as a Body of request GNG Record MUST to have Id - int CreatedBy - user email address as a string FormData - JSON string equivalent of GNG Record [Refer PoerApp Screen#2] GngStatusId - int Content-Type:Application/json Output: JSON for newly created GNG record example: https://myserverurl/api/v1/byopId/OPPO-004
/// part of request body HTTP Operation StatusStatus
